text: Narsingarh is a census town in West Tripura district in the Indian state of Tripura. ==Demographics== India census, Narsingarh had a population of 6819. Males constitute 55% of the population and females 45%. Narsingarh has an average literacy rate of 71%, higher than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 78%, and female literacy is 62%. In Narsingarh, 10% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in West Tripura district Category:West Tripura district
title: Narsingarh, Tripura
